aboutQueue.title: About queue - Cicle of a transaction
aboutQueue.statusQueuing: Transaction entered the queue with the first confirmation.
aboutQueue.statusQueued: Transaction is in the queue waiting for execution.
aboutQueue.statusConfirming: Transaction was executed and has one confirmation.
aboutQueue.statusConfirmed: Transaction was executed and has at least ten confirmations.
aboutQueue.statusFailed: Transaction failed in any of the involved steps.

tooltip.text:
Only list >= 1 block confirmation.
Confirming: Transaction with at least one confirmation and less than 10.
Confirmed: Transaction with more than 10 confirmations.
Open: Transaction confirmed, transaction successfully queued to processed on next settlement.
Settled: Transaction executed on last settlement.

headers.amountReserve: This amount include platform commission + gas fee + interest if its applied

feedback.sign: Sign the transaction in your wallet

allowance.statusText1: Before continuing with the operation, you must authorize the allowance so that the system can access the tokens.
allowance.statusText2: Optionally you can set an unlimited allowance checking the checkbox. Warning: if you don't know the implicances of doing this, leave it unchecked.
allowance.statusDisallowanceText: Before continuing with the operation, you must authorize the revoke so that the system can no longer access the tokens.
allowance.setUnlimited: Set unlimited allowance. Don't ask me again.

feedback.sign: Please, sign the allowance authorization transaction using your wallet.
feedback.waiting: Please, wait while the allowance authorization is mined in the blockchain. Once itÂ´s done, the transaction will be sent to your wallet.

fees.disclaimer1: This fee will be deduced from the amount to be transferred.
fees.disclaimer2: Amounts may change at the transaction confirmation

swapModal.text1: RIF Dollar (RDOC) has changed to RIF US Dollar (USDRIF). You need to swap your RIF Dollars to operate with the updated DAPP. You won't be able to see your RDOC balance in the DAPP. Please, swap your tokens using the
swapModal.explanation1: RIF Dollar on Chain (RDOC) is changing to RIF US Dollar (USDRIF). You need to swap your RIF Dollar on Chain (RDOC) to operate with the new DAPP. You will no longer be able to see your RDOC balance in the DAPP.
swapModal.explanation2: The exchange rate for the swap is 1 RDOC = 1 USDRIF. You will not be charged a transaction fee, only gas fees will apply.
swapModal.explanation3: Clicking Confirm button on your wallet will ask you to sign the transaction. All your RDOC balance will be converted to USDRIF
swapModal.allowanceSignText: Please, sign the allowance authorization transaction using your wallet.
swapModal.migrationTransactionSignText: Please, sign the migration transaction using your wallet.
swapModal.allowanceWaiting: Please, wait while the allowance authorization is mined in the blockchain. Once itâ€™s done, the transaction will be sent to your wallet.
swapModal.tokenMigrationWaitingText: Please, wait while the token migration is mined in the blockchain.

cta.explanation: You will be able to unstake at any time with a release delay of 30 days (no rewards received during this period). After this period you will be able to 'Withdraw'.

allowance.title: Set the allowance
allowance.description: Before continuing with the staking you must set the allowance so that the staking system can access the tokens. This has to be done only once and it doesn't lock any tokens from your wallet.
allowance.setUnlimited: Set unlimited allowance. Don't ask me again.

modal.StakingOptionsModal_AllowanceDescription: Before continuing with the staking you must set the allowance so that the staking system can access the tokens. This has to be done only once and it doesn't lock any tokens from your wallet.
modal.StakingOptionsModal_StakingDescription: Staked Flips will receive rewards from the Flip Staking Rewards Program. You can unstake your Flips whenever you want, the withdraw process will take 30 days
modal.StakingOptionsModal_UnstakingDescription: You will be able to withdraw your Flip Tokens to your wallet in 30 days. You can restake them anytime in this period.
modal.StakingOptionsModal_WithdrawDescription: After withdrawal your Flip tokens will be available in your wallet
modal.StakingOptionsModal_RestakeDescription: After confirming, this amount of Flipl Tokens will be removed from the processing queue and staked again. They will immediately start receiving Flip Staking Rewards.
modal.StatusModal_Modal_TxStatus_sign: Sign the transaction in your wallet

staking.Error_maxExceeded: The number exceeds the maximum allowed

page1.stepTitle: You donâ€™t have any Vesting Machine (VM) Loaded yet
page1.explanation1: If you have a VM address, please click 'Load VM' button to access it.
page1.explanation2: If you are a MOC staker with a claim code, congrats! Please click 'Use Claim Code' button to create the Vesting Machine for your Flip tokens.

page2.stepTitle: Letâ€™s create a new Vesting Machine (VM) using a Claim Code
page2.label: Enter your Claim Code below
page2.placeholder: You can paste your claim code here or select 'load from file' button
page2.explanation1: You can either paste your Claim Code from clipboard or load it from file. Then click the Create VM button to get the Vesting Machine address. As this is a transaction, you will have to sign it with your wallet.

feedback.notValid: Not valid claim code. You need to claim with the original address

page3.ownerLabel: Owner of the Vesting Machine to be created
page3.ctaInfo: This tokens are going to be vested in the Vesting Machine related to the wallet you are currently connected. Please, verify the information above before confirming. Once the transaction is signed, it is not possible to roll it back.

page4.successMessage: Congratulations! You have successfully claimed your Flip tokens and created a Vesting Machine (VM). Please, read carefully the information below and don't forget to save your vesting address as indicated.
page4.ctaInfo: Write down the VM address and don't loose it. You will need it to load your Vesting Machine.

alert.title: Using Vesting Adress
alert.explanation: To use your regular wallet turn of 'Use Vesting Address' in the wallet settings

status.notVerified: This Vesting Machine is not verified yet
